summary: When it is discovered that a man is having luck in the casinos in Las Vegas, people start attempting to take his money.
cast: Rebecca De Mornay|Vincent D'Onofrio|Richard Edson|Saverio Guerra|Delroy Lindo|Michael Madsen|Billy Bob Thornton|Frank Whaley|Luis Contreras|Ed Pansullo|Sy Richardson|Craig Vincent|Biff Yeager|Del Zamora|Roger Jennings|Alex Cox|Bubba Ganter
title: El ganador
